com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

Class SpreadsheetLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.AbstractLayer
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.AbstractSystemLayer
        • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.SpreadsheetLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatelineModelListener, IGanttChartModelListener, IEditable, FocusListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, CellEditorListener, MouseInputListener, TreeWillExpandListener

    public class SpreadsheetLayer
extends AbstractSystemLayer
implements IGanttChartModelListener, FocusListener, MouseInputListener, CellEditorListener, IDatelineModelListener, PropertyChangeListener, TreeWillExpandListener, IEditable
    The spreadsheet layer gets used when the Gantt chart wants to display the spreadsheet data provided by the IGanttChartModel.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    IGanttChartModel.getSpreadsheetValue(com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.gantt.ISpreadsheet, Object, ITimeSpan), ISpreadsheetCellRenderer, ISpreadsheetCellEditor

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.AbstractLayer

      • getCellEditor

        public ISpreadsheetCellEditor getCellEditor()
        Returns the currently used cell editor. This is the editor that the layer seemed most appropriate to use for editing the user selected spreadsheet cell. The editor was chosen based on the object type of the current cell value or the class returned by IGanttChartModel.getSpreadsheetValueType(ISpreadsheet, Object, ITimeSpan) .
        Returns:
        the cell editor that is currently being used
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        setCellEditor(Class, ISpreadsheetCellEditor)

      • editCellFocused

        public boolean editCellFocused(InputEvent evt)
        Starts the editing of the currently focused spreadsheet cell.
        Specified by:
        editCellFocused in interface IEditable
        Parameters:
        evt - the input event, which triggered the editing operation
        Returns:
        TRUE if the cell can be edited
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        editCellAt(int, ITimeSpan)

      • editCellAt

        public boolean editCellAt(int row,
                          ITimeSpan span)
        Programmatically starts editing the cell at row and span, if those indices are in the valid range, and the cell at those indices is editable.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to be edited
        span - the time span to be edited
        Returns:
        FALSE if for any reason the cell cannot be edited, or if the indices are invalid
        Since:
        2.1

      • editCellAt

        public boolean editCellAt(int row,
                          ITimeSpan span,
                          InputEvent e)
        Programmatically starts editing the cell at row and span, if those indices are in the valid range, and the cell at those indices is editable.
        Parameters:
        row - the row to be edited
        span - the time span to be edited
        e - the event that triggered the edit operation
        Returns:
        FALSE if for any reason the cell cannot be edited, or if the indices are invalid
        Since:
        2.1

      • getCellEditor

        public ISpreadsheetCellEditor getCellEditor(int row,
                                            ITimeSpan span)
        Returns the cell editor for the spreadsheet cell specified by the given row and time span.
        Parameters:
        row - the row where the cell is located
        span - the time span where the cell is located
        Returns:
        the spreadsheet cell editor appropriate for editing the value of the given cell
        Since:
        2.1

      • setCellRenderer

        public void setCellRenderer(Class cl,
                            ISpreadsheetCellRenderer renderer)
        Specifies a spreadsheet cell renderer for the given object type. Cell renderers are used during the rendering of the spreadsheet layer. Different cell renderers can be used for different spreadsheet cells, depending on the type of object shown in that cell.
        Parameters:
        cl - the object type
        renderer - the renderer used to visualize objects of the given type
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        getCellRenderer(Class)

      • setCellEditor

        public void setCellEditor(Class cl,
                          ISpreadsheetCellEditor editor)
        Specifies a cell editor for the given object type. Cell editors are used for editing the values of spreadsheet cells. Different cell editors can be used for different spreadsheet cells, depending on the type of object shown in that cell.
        Parameters:
        cl - the object type
        editor - the editor used to edit objects of the given type
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        getCellEditor(Class)

      • getCellRenderer

        public ISpreadsheetCellRenderer getCellRenderer(Class cl)
        Returns a spreadsheet cell renderer for the given object type. Cell renderers are used during the rendering of the spreadsheet layer. Different cell renderers can be used for different spreadsheet cells, depending on the type of object shown in that cell.
        Parameters:
        cl - the object type for which to return a matching cell renderer
        Returns:
        a cell renderer for the given object type
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        setCellRenderer(Class, ISpreadsheetCellRenderer)

      • getCellEditor

        public ISpreadsheetCellEditor getCellEditor(Class cl)
        Returns a cell editor for the given object type. Cell editors are used for editing the values in spreadsheet cells. Different cell editors can be used for different spreadsheet cells, depending on the type of object shown in that cell.
        Parameters:
        cl - the object type for which to return a matching cell editor
        Returns:
        a cell editor for the given object type
        Since:
        2.1
        See Also:
        setCellEditor(Class, ISpreadsheetCellEditor)
